Title: A Dog's Will
Writer: Guel Arraes, Adriana Falcão, João Falcão, Ariano Suassuna (play)
Actors: Matheus Nachtergaele, Selton Mello, Rogério Cardoso, Denise Fraga
Plot: The lively João Grilo and the sly Chicó are poor guys living in the hinterland who cheat a bunch of people in a small Northeast Brazil town. But when they die, they have to be judged by ...
